name: Cosmo And Yuuko: A Space Adventure
name_original: Cosmo And Yuuko: A Space Adventure
description:
Cosmo and Yuuko A Space Adventure A Game by Pastel Sushi Club for the Epic Mega Jam 2019

Join Cosmo and Yuuko on a journey to the stars aboard the best spaceship ever, The Kleen Masheen! Press the right buttons in the screen or the ship will overheat! Watch out for Cateroids on the way down, Mom is cooking dinner!

Features  3 custom made songs and full leaderboard functionality, cool cutscenes and its available on all 3 desktop platforms!

Submit your score to our leaderboard, and see who can get back to Earth faster!

Team Pastel Sushi Club is
  • AsobuLab
  • Deviot - Garet Nicholas
  • All art (unless otherwise noted) by SaltyyJo- Joyce Lau
  • Willy Watson
  • All music by James Furukawa
